nodes.text: Black Two was the callsign used by the second member of Black Squadron.

At the Battle of Yavin, Mithel flew as Black Two in the Galactic Empire's Black Squadron and was killed in action. Later during the Galactic Civil War, a pilot flew as Black Two during a skirmish over a green planet.

During the search for Lor San Tekka, Captain Temmin Wexley flew as Black Two, for the Resistance. Following the Battle of Starkiller Base, Karé Kun flew under the callsign for Black Squadron's mission to locate allies of the Resistance.
